candidates.description:
Retribution is in order. Having lost the 2020 election (though he'd say different if you asked him,) and debatably being the reason for the GOP's poor midterm performance, Donald Trump has remained the once and future king of the Republican Party. Bearing that in mind, Trump is basically taking a victory lap before he goes on to the actual fight against Biden.

If he wants the nomination, which he does, he'll get it. Trump is basically coasting until the convention. Nonetheless, that doesn't mean he won't put on a show until he gets there.
I was gonna make the Haley and DeSantis sides semi-serious or at least full length but I couldn't think of anything interesting to do with them so nah. I invite anyone who wants to to redux this mod.

The president-in-waiting's campaign is far more muscular than the competitiveness of this race would imply. Trump merchandise of all stripes, selling at a brisk pace. Trump rallies, where the Donald uncorks his usual ramblings. Trump's own social media platform, Truth Social,for digital versions of the same.

About the only thing Trump isn't doing is actually running against his opponents. Instead, he seems to be treating the primaries as more of a test run for the general than anything else. He's inevitable, after all.

issues.name: Donald Trump
stances: guys maybe he's not that great actually
guys maybe he's not that great actually
guys maybe he's not that great actually

questions.description: You've decided to throw your hat into the ring. What themes will you hit on in your announcement speech?

answers.description: Let's go on the attack on Biden, or rather Harris, because that's how you're really going to be voting for. We can't keep relying on the same old, tired names from twenty years ago. We've got to let new leadership take over. I can be that
answers.feedback: You've hidden a dig at Trump in your dig at Biden. This goes over the heads of the MAGA base, and independents are pleased. But this doesn't do anything to help you stand out from the crowd.

answers.description: Joe Biden's weakness on the world stage has made us a laughingstock abroad. When I'm in office, we'll be respected again.
answers.feedback: Not backing down from your neocon roots, eh? This helps you create a clear contrast from the field, especially once the likes of Pence, Scott and Christie drop out.

answers.description: I want to laser-focus on the delegates here. If we win or cut it close in the early states, we might just win this thing.
answers.feedback: A pragmatic choice. Scott and Christie's dropouts help you in SC and NH respectively. Trump isn't even on the ballot in Nevada, but winning there could send a message.

answers.description: Let's talk issues. I'm against wokeness,CRT, all that stuff. The base should love that
answers.feedback: DeSantis and Trump have the culture warriors locked up. This only makes independents, your base, nervous.

questions.description: Will you attend the debates? Or acknowledge your opponents at all, for that matter?

answers.feedback:
Oh my God, Mr. Trump. I'm so sorry for suggesting you needed to do anything at all to
win. Here's the nomination my glorious king

questions.description: Will you make a bunch of gaffes, idiotically try and run to Trump's right and generally appear like a raging bigot and a fool to boot?

answers.description: What? why would I do that?
answers.feedback: Good job! You might even win something at this rate.

theme.quote: “I could have said, ‘drop to your knees and beg,’ and he would have done it.”- DJT

scenarioName: 2024: The Race to Be the Guy Who Loses to Trump
scenarioDescription:
Donald Trump. 78 years old. Impeached twice. A convicted felon. The next Republican nominee. Along with the equally inevitable Joe Biden, he's one of what's shaping up to be the most unpopular pair of nominees in American history (beating the record set by himself eight years ago). On paper, it's an open primary for the Republicans.

No matter. Both parties have long ago stopped hoping for anything better that these two old men. Now is the time for falling in line, kissing the ring, and hoping’ ‘28 will bring better times.
credits: This scenario was made by Metheguy.

tooltips.value: It's like poetry. They rhyme.
Stopped Trump from overturning the 2020 election. Completely unelectable thanks to this.
The only candidate who knows what he's here for.
I don't know how to simulate primaries in OSEG, and i'm not gonna figure it out just for this fuckass joke mod.
Unburdened by what has been.
Another Palmetto Stater. Running for VP.

furtherReading: Inspired by someone asking for a 2024 primaries mod on tctcord and I made a quick ass mockup to show why that'd be a dumb idea. Then for some reason I decided to make it a full mod
